posts.post_content:
I have 20 T206's I would like to trade for T206's I need for my set. Anyone interested in trading let me know, I am sure we can work out a deal. I still need over 300 cards so I need most.
I can't get the back pic to load so if anyone is interested and wants a pic of the backs let me know.
Cards available:
Cross - Piedmont (trimmed)
Murray - Piedmont (trimmed)
Ford - Polar Bear
Herzog - Piedmont (back damage)
La Porte - Polar Bear
Smith - Sweet Cap

Graham - Sweet Cap
